_source.text: 1110 - 488-5 Broad to bowl from the Cathedral Road End... come on Broady, got to be better than yesterday... leg-side delivery flicked away for four by Haddin... bouncer top-edged for four by Haddin... Broad's frustration gets the better of him, as he shies for the stumps with Haddin rooted in his crease.

text: 1110 - 488-5 Broad to bowl from the Cathedral **Road** End... come on Broady, got to be **better** **than** **yesterday**
... leg-side delivery flicked **away** for four by Haddin... bouncer top-edged for four by Haddin
